::Feline::
"Good, as soon as Zardus is done with his current project, then you 
can give him the info."  She purred,"You will battle the maximals 
soon enough. But that is up to Zardus, I am no leader."

KitKat::
She reopened her link,"Drillbit, come to the entrance, we are 
leaving." 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He wraped his left arm around her waist.
> "Dont worry, I'll give him the info. I am an Alliance member now. 
Oh,
> when do you think we'll battle Maxi's? I promised one, that I would 
kill
> her."
> 
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He got up, and searched for KitKat.
